name: Cheesy Omelet Roll
description: Easy to make and beautiful to serve at any meal.
preparation: Whisk eggs, milk, and flour until smooth.
Stir in dip mixes and diced pepper.
Pour onto a Sheet Pan lined with a lightly oiled Sheet Pan Liner.
Bake 10–15 minutes until eggs are set.
Sprinkle omelet evenly with cheese and bake for a further 2 minutes until cheese is melted.
Starting at the short end, roll up omelet, using the Sheet Pan Liner as a guide.
Cut into slices, season to taste, and top with a spoonful of Poco Picante Salsa.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Irresistible flavors of smoky bacon (plant-based), real Parmesan & chives.

products.name: 3 Onion Dip Mix
summary: These onions won’t make you cry—they’re pure happiness in a jar! Save time (and tears) on chopping and use this blend anytime you’re looking for the robust flavour of onions, chives, and scallions. Take it way beyond the dip bowl and use 3 Onion as a sauce or seasoning for eggs, veggies, burgers, tacos, and more!

products.name: Poco Picante Salsa Mix
summary: The vibrant flavours of cayenne, chilies, and garlic come together to create a zesty salsa with a medium kick.

products.name: Sheet Pan
summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.

products.name: Sheet Pan Liner
summary: Nonstick silicone baking sheet. Ideal for baking, roasting, sheet pan meals & more!
